Task - Class in com.virtualbankv2.entity
The Task class represents a task in the system, including details such as task ID, description, title, start and end dates, associated user, reward, and completion status.
Task(String, double, String, String, String, String) - Constructor for class com.virtualbankv2.entity.Task
Constructs a new Task with the specified description, reward, title, start date, end date, and username.

Constructs a new Task with the specified values.
